Tim Sackton.name: Tim Sackton
Tim Sackton.title: Director of Bioinformatics
Tim Sackton.profile: Tim runs the Bioinformatics group. While his background is population and comparative genomics, these days he does a little bit of everything.

Adam Freedman.name: Adam Freedman
Adam Freedman.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Adam Freedman.profile: Adam is our resident expert in genome annotation and RNA-seq analysis, and also has a background in population and conservation genetics.

Danielle Khost.name: Danielle Khost
Danielle Khost.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Danielle Khost.profile: Danielle is our resident expert in long read sequencing, and works on a variety of challenging genome assembly problems.

Gregg Thomas.name: Gregg Thomas
Gregg Thomas.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Gregg Thomas.profile: Gregg develops phylogenetic methods and has studied convergent evolution, molecular evolution of rodents and insects, and mutation rates in primates.

Lei Ma.name: Lei Ma
Lei Ma.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Lei Ma.profile: Lei is primarily responsible for developing training and outreach material; she also has a background in metagenomics and microbial ecology.

Rawan Olayan.name: Rawan Olayan
Rawan Olayan.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Rawan Olayan.profile: Rawan is funded by a collaboration with Boehringer Ingelheim, and works on single cell RNA-seq methods.

Allison Shultz.name: Allison Shultz
Allison Shultz.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Allison Shultz.profile: Allison is now the Associate Curator of Ornithology at the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County.

Brian Arnold.name: Brian Arnold
Brian Arnold.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Brian Arnold.profile: Brian is now a departmental data scientist with the Ecology and Evolutionary Biology department at Princeton.

Ming Tang.name: Ming "Tommy" Tang
Ming Tang.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Ming Tang.profile: Tommy is now the Director of Computational Biology at Immunitas Therapeutics.

Scott Van Buren.name: Scott Van Buren
Scott Van Buren.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Scott Van Buren.profile: Scott is now a Scientific Investigator in Computational Biology at GSK.

Juerg Straubhaar.name: Juerg Straubhaar
Juerg Straubhaar.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Juerg Straubhaar.profile: Juerg worked primarily on proteomics data with the Mass Spec Core and the Melton Lab while he was in the group.

John Gaspar.name: John Gaspar
John Gaspar.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
John Gaspar.profile: John is now a Data Science and Bioinformatics Team Lead at Merck.

Yasin Kaymaz.name: Yasin Kaymaz
Yasin Kaymaz.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Yasin Kaymaz.profile: Yasin is now an Assistant Professor at Ege University in Izmir, Turkey.

Alexandria D'Souza.name: Alexandria D'Souza
Alexandria D'Souza.title: Senior Bioinformatics Scientist
Alexandria D'Souza.profile: Alexandria primarily worked with the mass spec core and the Woo lab while she was in the group.

Subir Shakya.name: Subir Shakya
Subir Shakya.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
Subir Shakya.profile: Subir works on population and comparative genomics of birds, funded by an NIH grant to study enhancer evolution in birds.

Ekaterina Osipova.name: Katya Osipova
Ekaterina Osipova.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
Ekaterina Osipova.profile: Katya works on convergent evolution of brood parasitic birds, funded by an NSF grant to study the genomics of these species.

Sara Smith Wuitchik.name: Sara Smith Wuitchik
Sara Smith Wuitchik.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
Sara Smith Wuitchik.profile: Sara is now an Assistant Professor at Mount Royal University in Calgary, Canada.

Alex Llanos Garrido.name: Alex Llanos Garrido
Alex Llanos Garrido.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
Alex Llanos Garrido.profile: Alex is now at the Universidad Complutense Madrid.

Veronika Laine.name: Veronika Laine
Veronika Laine.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
Veronika Laine.profile: Veronika is now at the Finnish Museum of Natural History working on bats.

Aaron Kitzmiller.name: Aaron Kitzmiller
Aaron Kitzmiller.title: Director of Software Operations
Aaron Kitzmiller.profile: Journeyman wrangler of science adjacent software projects

David D'Antonio.name: David D'Antonio
David D'Antonio.title: Applications Professional
David D'Antonio.profile: Front end developer for instrument facility applications

Jared Vessella-Smith.name: Jared Vessella-Smith
Jared Vessella-Smith.title: Applications Professional
Jared Vessella-Smith.profile: Full stack developer for instrument facility applications

Meghan Correa.name: Meghan Correa
Meghan Correa.title: Applications Professional
Meghan Correa.profile: Former full stack developer currently at Cisco

Andy Bryant.name: Andy Bryant
Andy Bryant.title: Applications Professional
Andy Bryant.profile: Former front end developer for instrument facility applications
